abstrac: Author and editor, ready to tackle fiction work manuscripts and polish them for the world to delight in. YA fiction and the fantasy genre are what I excel at presently.
bio:
Who am I?
In short, a child of Europe with an affinity for stories. Fiction has been a major part of my life for as long as I can tell. I started writing in middle grade (in English, despite being Romanian), and ever since, over ten years later, have bettered my skills in both language and the writing craft. It is my wish to now use the skills I have accumulated to help others push past their limits so they may publish a manuscript they are proud to have the world see.

How I work?
What I can for do you is proofreading and editing. Be warned that I am brutally honest when I comment on someone's manuscript. I will tell you all I find mistaken, but just as well, I will tell you where your strengths lie and all that is good with your story. Criticism hurts, I learned that firsthand, but it is through constructive criticism that we grow, and it is what I plan to help with.

If you think I may be a good fit to edit your manuscripts, please get in touch. Looking forward to hearing from you!

abstrac: SEO Expert | Website Developer | Content Developer
bio:
Hello There! I'm Maqbool, located in Mumbai. I am an experienced website designer and developer with over 10 years of experience with WordPress, Wix, and Shopify. I am also an SEO expert and Content creator and I work with a team. I am a project manager at IMM Pvt. Ltd. We are located in India and I am actively looking for projects that could help us have a strong standing on Guru and also challenge us to build our area of expertise in marketing and development. 

When we work on SEO projects we are following all the on-page and off-page requirements along with content creation and social media group promotion. Our objective is to increase traffic to your website and promote and push its ranking with medium to high volume keywords on Google and Bing. 

I am fully equipped to take on as many development projects as they come as we work hard but also fast. We do not take days and months of time for simple things that can be done within hours. Get in touch with us and we will share with you a list of projects that we have done so far. We are experts in the following:

Ecommerce Website Development
Corporate Website Development
Multi-vendor/Single-vendor Ecommerce Development
Restaurants, Cafes, Beauty Parlours Website Development

When we develop your website we also optimize it completely for SEO. We create the content and even a portfolio for you so that you do not have anything missing to start getting traffic and sales.

We are also content developers. At IMM, you will find that we do not ask for payment unless our clients are satisfied with the work that we have delivered. We can create high-quality website copies, blogs, PRs, app descriptions, social media posts, and more. You name me and we have a team ready to do the work for you as per your requirements and requested date of delivery. 

We would love to hear about your project. Send us a "hello", let's chat.

abstrac: Committed to providing statistical data analytics solutions using SPSS, AMOS, and Excel
bio:
I am Abdullah Malik (Gold Medalist), a professional researcher, and a data analyst having an MBA & M.Phil degree with over 10 years of experience. I have national and international certifications in qualitative and quantitative data analysis. I have many international clients from the USA, UK, UAE, Jordan, Hungary, Singapore, and Pakistan.

If you want to apply statistics to your raw data, let me process your data, analyze it and provide you with simple & understandable visualizations.

I will:
• use statistical software (SPSS, AMOS and Excel)
• import data from excel or google forms/sheets
• apply statistical tests based on your requirements
• review outputs
• data visualization and short interpretation

Please note:
• I do not process quizzes
• I do not process any unlawful data.

For more details, please contact me, and you will get a quick response. You will be happy to get the best experience.

Regards,
Abdullah Malik
